name: Marstranded
description:
Your ship crashed on Mars. You must try to survive using anything you can find on the surface. A diary of the previous mission may help you. Don't move too fast or your oxygen will be depleted faster. Avoid holes, drones, try to get Oxygen and communicate.

Controls: WASD/Arrows

Space: Start/skip scenes.

Warning. You will be able to use a tracker to identify holes. Be aware when you start hearing the signal, a hole may be next to you.

pd: Obviously inspired by Silent Scream.
